title: Immortal Sergeant cinema slide
brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Immortal Sergeant’ featuring Henry Fonda and Maureen O’Hara by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Pieces of black tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.

This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Immortal Sergeant’ featuring Henry Fonda and Maureen O’Hara by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Pieces of black tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.
